titleStmt.title: Apostolicall baptisme: or, A sober rejoinder, to a treatise written by Mr. Thomas Blake; intituled, Infants baptisme freed from Antichristianisme. In answer to a book written by Ch. Blackwood; called, The storming of Antichrist. / Written by Ch. Blackwood.
titleStmt.author: Blackwood, Christopher.
